sourcesContent:
{{notFoundMessage}} {{resetLinkText}}
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-not-found', templateUrl: './not-found.component.html', styleUrls: ['./not-found.component.scss'] }) export class NotFoundComponent { @Input() visible = false; @Input() notFoundMessage = "Noting Found !"; @Input() resetLinkText = "Reset"; @Input() resetLinkRoute = "/"; }
